content: GF#13624 wins the prize for the best specified task I've ever seen. It needs something done with it
@Gil Alterovitz or @James Jones - can you ask Gil?
Already applied, in the sense that the genetic profile names and hierarchies are covered by our IG.
I think Grahame's request is that the tracker be clarified a bit more in terms of what the requested change is
I don't mind if it goes away. But it can't stay open as change to be applied like that
